Text: Netirʼadua-mi, O O̩jo̩;
Nyʼumi eti, kʼe̩ dohi ñw mi;
Tod omuko̩la e̩nebi le̩,
I kpanyʼumi e̩do̩ tabale,
Ailo kpai o̩la ega lewa bʼumi ma,
Tak u kakini, O omi ma nʼika dab o̩madegu!
go, e̩gbale̩ omi ma taligo o̩najiji,
omi ma hiane̩ alo kʼu fʼafu ibi kpai e̩du omi le̩ o̩wo̩.
O Ondu, mʼuma ko mi, fʼalu ichi-ma guji;
Odu kpai o̩ro̩ka ma jʼoj odo̩-wñ ale daka;
e̩wñ bibi jʼalumeji-wñ;
Todu i chʼe̩nebiʼka bʼumi ina-i n—
I muda chʼuwe̩, kʼe̩ chʼone̩ e̩go̩-mi,
Awa kʼa nyojuju e̩rinyo̩ kpai o̩la-wa le̩;
Uku ki lewa bʼuma ma achigili;
I chʼe-mi, nakwado̩ O̩jo̩;
Olane̩ kpai olodudu kpai o̩ro̩ka
I mʼonugo-mi gba tane̩ ef ure̩do̩
O̩jo̩ agbo̩, i la ade ma ma,
I mʼo̩wo̩-wñ nadala akobo̩ abo kʼe̩do̩-ma chebo̩rʼowñ,
Alu-wñ de̩ de̩le̩ de̩le̩ dab ekpo,
E̩wñ kʼi ko nyʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩ le̩ ko rikpolo no Jihofa,
O O̩jo̩, uwe̩ muda ako ma gwo̩ru
